name: Projekt Baby
description:
Made as part of the 8 Week Unity Course offered through Playcrafting (SF). More information can be found here:
https://www.playcrafting.com/event/learn-unity-8-weeks-sf/

BE THE BIRD HERO YOU WISHED YOU COULD BE

DEFEAT THE GIANT BABY

All the elements of modern drama await you in this epic adventure tale, reminiscent of the timeless struggle between David and Goliath. Jump your way through 16-bit history while listening to immersive sound design by Will Turpin. Experience 2D physics and body surfing like never before thanks to the coding expertise of Dante Netto. Enjoy levels designed by Christian Strohm to train noobs into masters of the jump button, all while exploring strange, foreign lands. You too can defeat the baby and have fun doing it!*

*victory not guaranteed.
